data: “When your mama was the geek, my dreamlets,” Papa would say, “she made the nipping off of noggins such a crystal mystery that the hens themselves yearned toward her, waltzing around her, hypnotized with longing.” ‘Spread your lips, sweet Lil,’ they’d cluck, ‘and show us your choppers!’

"When your mama was the geek, my dreamlets," Papa would say, "she made the nipping off of noggins such a crystal mystery that the hens themselves yearned toward her, waltzing around her, hypnotized with longing." ‘Spread your lips, sweet Lil,’ they’d cluck, ‘and show us your choppers!’"

“When your mama was the geek, my dreamlets,” Papa would say, “she made the nipping off of noggins such a crystal mystery that the hens themselves yearned toward her, waltzing around her, hypnotized with longing.” ‘Spread your lips, sweet Lil,’ they’d cluck, ‘and show us your choppers!’"
